metadata.title: YouTube Video Description Template 2025: Copy-Paste Examples
metadata.description: Optimize your YouTube descriptions with proven templates. SEO-friendly structures that boost discoverability.

hero.headline: YouTube Video Description Templates That Work
hero.subheadline: Copy-paste description structures optimized for SEO and viewer engagement.

sections.content: Your video description helps YouTube understand your content and gives viewers important context. A well-structured description improves discoverability, provides value to viewers, and supports your overall SEO strategy. These templates make description writing fast and effective.

content.title: Above the Fold
content.description: First 2-3 lines visible before 'Show more'. Most critical for SEO and click-through.

content.title: Timestamps
content.description: Chapter markers that improve navigation and appear in search results.

content.title: Links & CTAs
content.description: Subscribe, social links, affiliate links, and related content.

sections.title: Basic Description Template
content: Line 1: Hook sentence with primary keyword
Line 2-3: What this video covers (value proposition)

sections.title: Description Best Practices
content: Include primary keyword in first sentence

faq.question: How long should descriptions be?
faq.answer: Minimum 200 words for SEO. 300-500 words is ideal. Quality matters more than length. Don't keyword stuff.

faq.question: Do hashtags in descriptions matter?
faq.answer: Somewhat. First 3 hashtags appear above your title. Use 2-3 relevant hashtags. More can look spammy.

faq.question: Should I include affiliate links?
faq.answer: Yes, if relevant. Include proper disclosure. Don't overload with links. Place them logically after content description.

faq.question: Can I copy the same description to multiple videos?
faq.answer: No. Each description should be unique to the video content. Duplicate descriptions look spammy and miss SEO opportunities.
